frontmatter.description: In this article we'll explore a range of techniques and algorithms to determine the similarity between items. We will also explain the how and the why, and have a look at some use cases.
frontmatter.title: How to programmatically calculate similarities

frontmatter.description: If you want to use Ghost as your cms for hosting a blog on GitHub Pages, you need to have a static site generator. We will be using Gatsby to populate the content from our local Ghost installation and deploy it to GitHub Pages.
frontmatter.title: Deploy a Ghost blog on GitHub Pages using Gatsby
